name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MailTrack - Write entire mail track document.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An automatic email generator is a program or tool that generates email, and works on all sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that generates emails based on user input and it works on Gmail and other websites can be a useful tool for those who frequently send emails.
